altername_name: JGTC - All Japan Grand Touring Car Championship
name: GT All Japan Touring Car Championship
overview: The Japanese Touring Car Championship (abbr: JTCC, officially known as All Japan Touring Car Championship), is a former touring car racing series held in Japan. By 1993, like many other Group A series, the series had ended up becoming a one make affair with just the GT-R only appearing on the top category, followed by the M3s on the other, whereas in Div. 3 only consists of Corollas and Civics. For the following year the series would switch to the Supertouring formula. The playstation game GT All Japan Touring Car Championship is a top (isometric) view racing game using the cars and licenses from that championship. Also known as Zen Nihan GT Senshuken Kai.
